name: with pull request
jql: project = ODATA AND fixVersion in (V4.01_ERRATA01, V4.02) AND status in (New, Open, Resolved, Applied) AND development[pullrequests].open > 0 ORDER BY key ASC, summary ASC

name: RESOLVED without pull request
jql: project = ODATA AND fixVersion in (V4.01_ERRATA01, V4.02) AND status in (Resolved) AND development[pullrequests].open = 0 ORDER BY key ASC, summary ASC

name: NEW or OPEN without pull request
jql: project = ODATA AND fixVersion in (V4.01_ERRATA01, V4.02) AND status in (New, Open) AND development[pullrequests].open = 0 ORDER BY key ASC, summary ASC

name: NEW or OPEN
jql: project = ODATA AND status in (Open, New) AND fixVersion = V4.0_CS03 AND component = "Data Aggregation" ORDER BY key ASC

name: NEW or OPEN
jql: project = ODATA AND status in (Open, New) AND component = Temporal ORDER BY key ASC

name: NEW or OPEN
jql: project = ODATA AND status in (Open, New) AND component = Vocabularies AND fixVersion is null ORDER BY key ASC
